resources.string:
Highly organized and detail-oriented Final Year Engineering student who is a Self-taught Android App Developer (Native), Flutter Developer (Hybrid), UI | UX Designer and knows Data science. 

 🔭 I\’m currently working on a Mobile Application based on AI Short News App which is available at PlayStore 

 🌱 While doing the above work, I'm simultaneously getting comfortable with Data Structures and Algorithms concepts 

👨‍💻 My Personal Portfolio is available at https://lokesh2021.github.io 

💬 Ask me about Kotlin, Dart, Java, Android, Flutter,Data Structures and Algorithms 

📫 Feel free to reach me at lokeshbandi2021@gmail.com 

⚡ Fun fact - I'm a big Apple Fan but can't afford any of their products 😅😢
